notification_security.upem.fr.securitynotification.home

Class FragmentReceiver.BaseFragmentReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • notification_security.upem.fr.securitynotification.home.FragmentReceiver.BaseFragmentReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FragmentReceiver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnectionFragment, HomeAlertedFragment, HomeIdleFragment, ParameterFragment, SignUpFragment, SplashFragment
    Enclosing interface:
    FragmentReceiver

    public abstract static class FragmentReceiver.BaseFragmentReceiver
extends Fragment
implements FragmentReceiver
    Abstract Fragment factorizing and handling all network verifications during exchanges with the NetworkService and a HomeActivity's fragment. A fragment used by HomeActivity has to inherit from this abstract class and implement its methods, in order to communicate swiftly with the NetworkService.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface notification_security.upem.fr.securitynotification.home.FragmentReceiver

    • Method Detail

      • requestNetworkAction

        public final void requestNetworkAction(java.lang.String... params)
        Requests a new action on the NetworkService with the given params. If the current instance is in the right network states, it will call performNetworkRequest with params. It will not if the current BaseFragmentReceiver is already in WAITING_NETWORK_RESULT state.

      • onReceiveNetworkIntent

        public void onReceiveNetworkIntent(Intent intent)
        Description copied from interface: FragmentReceiver
        Receives the given intent from NetworkService to process. If the receiver is not in WAITING_NETWORK_RESULT, it will discard the call.
        Specified by:
        onReceiveNetworkIntent in interface FragmentReceiver
        Parameters:
        intent - the intent to process.

      • onActivityCreated

        public void onActivityCreated(Bundle savedInstanceState)
